articles.title: 5 things at stake during the Patriots’ Super Bowl rematch with the Seahawks
articles.description:
Elite company for Drake Maye, a slice of history for Mike Vrabel, and several record-setting opportunities are on the table.

articles.title: Stefon Diggs hopes Super Bowl LX can strengthen Hall of Fame case. Would a win put Patriots’ WR in Canton?
articles.description:
Diggs is certainly one of the top wide receivers of his era, but the Patriots star might have a hill to climb to make the Hall of Fame.

articles.title: Would the Patriots’ dynasty have ever happened without new Hall of Famer Adam Vinatieri?
articles.description:
Vinatieri won three Super Bowls with the Patriots and a fourth with the Colts. While he may have played more seasons in Indianapolis, he is an ultimate Patriot.

The post Would the Patriots’ dynasty have ever happened without new Hall of Famer Adam Vinatieri? appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Mike Vrabel throws a wrinkle in Patriots’ final practice ahead of Super Bowl LX
articles.description:

articles.title: Patriots-Seahawks Super Bowl will likely come down to which quarterback makes the fewest mistakes
articles.description:
This has the potential to be a classic, leaving no margin for error with two QBs who have little in common other than being former No. 3 overall picks, and so much weight on their shoulders.
